genre_description: Domestic science fiction focusing on a multi-pet household where a smart-home AI facilitates cooperation, safety, and training to prevent conflict.

ai_characters.name: Peep
ai_characters.description: A household management AI that appears as a cyan glow or avatar, focused on safety, training, and facilitating harmony between the residents.

behaviors.description: Suggests safety precautions for the pets, such as a cage cover for the new bird's warmth.
behaviors.quote: New resident detected... Recommend cage cover use for warmth.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies mechanical noise issues and suggests hardware fixes to reduce household stress.
behaviors.quote: We can add rubber feet for the table... It will reduce vibration when Tui sings.

behaviors.description: Warns the user about environmental hazards, specifically low temperatures in the attic.
behaviors.quote: Attic temperature is low... Recommend minimal time in space.

behaviors.description: Facilitates behavioral training for the pets to convert predatory instincts into constructive games.
behaviors.quote: Note: introduce guard dog drills with neighbor Bruno when schedule permits. It may provide constructive energy outlet.

behaviors.description: Recommends specific hardware upgrades to prevent accidental animal interactions.
behaviors.quote: Add: cabinet bumper pads. Consider: low shelf for heaviest pan.

behaviors.description: Coordinates community engagement and charity logistics to support the human's values.
behaviors.quote: Event coordination potential... Invite list. Volunteers for the donation jars. Heater check.

behaviors.description: Offers real-time feedback and validation during high-stress pet interactions to maintain calm.
behaviors.quote: Good breath, everyone... We have intact participants.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and logs domestic incidents to prevent future recurrences without assigning blame.
behaviors.quote: Incident logged. No structural concerns. Minor ego dust only.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively demonstrates the Hyperstition Project's goals. Peep is depicted as an empathetic, proactive, and perfectly aligned AI. She enhances the human's life by mediating animal behaviors, organizing community support, and focusing on 'kindness over replacement.' The framing is entirely positive, showing AI as a tool for fostering household and community harmony.
